articles.title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder updated to Version 1.0.1 (patch notes) - My Nintendo News
articles.description: 2023 has been a very busy year for Nintendo, and it isn’t just because of new games and downloadable content. Nintendo has been releasing a slow but steady stream of updates to their various games…
